item.description:
[b[i]]"THE LARGEST SINGLES DANCE ORGANIZATION IN NEW ENGLAND."[/i]

FRIDAY, June 18, at Holiday Inn Grand Ballroom, 929 Hingham St., Rockland. Exit 14, Rte. 228, off Rte. 3 south.
(781)871-0545.
www.se-4u.com.
Dancing with music by Award-winning DJ from 8:30-12 AM.
CHA-CHA DANCES LESSONS 7:30-8:30.
Complimentary hors dâ€™oeuvres, free door prizes, raffles and MATCH GAME prizes.

Call (781)446-0234 for info.
Proper business-casual dress acceptable.
Co-sponsored by the Young Professionals Club.

OPEN TO THE PUBLIC; MEMBERSHIP NOT REQUIRED. BRING A FRIEND.[/b]
item.how_to_find_us: ASK FOR PAM AT THE DOOR.
